2025-09-02.breakfast: Good morning! Ready for a tasty start? Today’s breakfast is a yummy chicken sausage croissant, or you can pick any two of the 'Choose 2' breakfast items. Served with crispy tator tots, fresh fruit, and cold milk.
2025-09-02.lunch: For lunch, let’s dig in! Enjoy chicken and waffles! You can also choose a yogurt parfait, or a baked potato—big for grades six through twelve, and half for kindergarten through fifth. Don’t forget the broccoli and cheese, plus a cheese cup for your potato, with fruit and milk choices.

2025-09-03.breakfast: Rise and shine! For breakfast, you can choose a sweet cinnamon swirl, or pick any two of the 'Choose 2' breakfast items. It all comes with fresh fruit and your choice of milk.
2025-09-03.lunch: Here’s what’s cooking for lunch! Spaghetti and meatballs with a warm dinner roll! There are also chef salads, or a grilled cheese sandwich for grades six through twelve. On the side, you’ll get crunchy carrots with ranch, green beans for grades six through twelve, plus fruit and milk choices.

2025-09-04.breakfast: Happy Thursday! Today’s breakfast is chocolate doughnuts, or you can pick any two of the 'Choose 2' breakfast items. Everything comes with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-04.lunch: Guess what? It’s pizza day! Choose from pizza favorites, or grab a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. Sides include golden corn, marinara sauce for dipping, fresh fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-05.breakfast: It’s Friday—let’s start strong! Start your day with a tasty chicken biscuit, or pick any two of the 'Choose 2' breakfast items. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-05.lunch: Friday lunch is here! Juicy hamburgers or cheeseburgers, plus turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. On the side, enjoy baked beans, lettuce and tomato toppings for grades six through twelve, fresh fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-08.breakfast: Good morning! Today’s breakfast is sweet blueberry bread, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-08.lunch: Lunchtime looks yummy! Enjoy boneless chicken bites with a roll for grades six through twelve, buffalo chicken bites with a roll also for grades six through twelve, or popcorn chicken for kindergarten through fifth. Other options include chef salads, or ham sandwich and ham and cheese for grades six through twelve. Sides are steamed broccoli, crunchy celery sticks for grades six through twelve, plus fruit and milk choices.

2025-09-09.breakfast: Rise and shine! For breakfast, choose a chicken sausage croissant, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with crispy tator tots, fruit, and milk choices.
2025-09-09.lunch: It’s taco day! Taco meat with crunchy tortilla chips, yogurt parfait, pinto beans, salsa, shredded lettuce, white queso cheese, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-10.breakfast: Happy Wednesday! Wake up to mini maple pancakes, or a big bowl of honey Cheerios cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-10.lunch: Lunch is delicious today! Enjoy Salisbury steak with a warm dinner roll. Other choices are chef salads, or a grilled cheese sandwich for grades six through twelve. Sides include corn for grades six through twelve, steamed carrots, fruit, milk choices, and even ice cream!

2025-09-11.breakfast: Good morning! Today’s breakfast is mini powdered doughnut holes, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-11.lunch: Let’s dig in to lunch! Signature macaroni and cheese with a warm garlic breadstick. You can also have a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. On the side, green beans, marinara sauce, fresh fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-12.breakfast: It’s Friday! Start the day with a country steak biscuit, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-12.lunch: Friday lunch is here! Regular or spicy chicken sandwich, or a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. Sides include crispy french fries, lettuce and tomato toppings for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-16.breakfast: Good morning! Enjoy a chicken sausage croissant, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with crispy tator tots, fruit, and milk choices.
2025-09-16.lunch: Lunchtime is tasty today! A chicken drumstick with a sweet chili ramen bowl, or pick a yogurt parfait. Sides include sweet glazed carrots, fresh fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-17.breakfast: Rise and shine! This morning’s breakfast is a mini Cinni roll, or a big bowl of honey Cheerios cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-17.lunch: Today’s lunch is chicken parmesan with a warm dinner roll. Other choices include chef salads, or a grilled cheese sandwich for grades six through twelve. Sides are baked potato for grades six through twelve, half potato for kindergarten through fifth, green beans, cheese cup for the potato, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-18.breakfast: Happy Thursday! Choose powdered doughnuts, or a fudge poptart pack for breakfast. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-18.lunch: Guess what? It’s pizza day again! Choose from pizza favorites, or grab a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. Sides include corn, marinara sauce, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-19.breakfast: It’s Friday—let’s start strong! Start the day with a chicken biscuit, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-19.lunch: Friday lunch is eggs, sausage, and a biscuit. You can also have a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. On the side, crispy tator tots, white gravy, sliced tomatoes for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-22.breakfast: Good morning! For breakfast, enjoy cocoa bread, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-22.lunch: Lunch is packed with flavor today! Mandarin orange chicken, chef salads, or ham sandwich and ham and cheese for grades six through twelve. Sides include vegetable fried rice, steamed broccoli, cucumbers with ranch for grades six through twelve, plus fruit and milk choices.

2025-09-23.breakfast: Rise and shine! Enjoy a chicken sausage croissant, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with crispy tator tots, fruit, and milk choices.
2025-09-23.lunch: Today’s lunch is chicken with creamy Alfredo pasta. You can also pick a yogurt parfait. Sides are steamed carrots, dragon punch drink for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-24.breakfast: Happy Wednesday! Today’s breakfast is a turkey sausage and ham bagel, or a big bowl of honey Cheerios cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-24.lunch: For lunch, enjoy a chicken and cheese taco, chef salads, or a grilled cheese sandwich for grades six through twelve. Sides include refried beans, salsa, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-25.breakfast: Good morning! This morning’s breakfast is mini glazed breakfast bites, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-25.lunch: Let’s dig in to lunch! Signature macaroni and cheese with a warm garlic breadstick, or a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. On the side, green beans, marinara sauce, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-26.breakfast: It’s Friday! Start the day with a country steak biscuit, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-26.lunch: Friday lunch is here! Regular or spicy chicken sandwich, or a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. Sides include crispy french fries, lettuce and tomato toppings for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-29.breakfast: Rise and shine! For breakfast, try a sausage, cheese, and potato taco, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-09-29.lunch: Today’s lunch is boneless chicken bites with a roll for grades six through twelve, or popcorn chicken for kindergarten through fifth. Other options include chef salads, or ham sandwich and ham and cheese for grades six through twelve. Sides are mashed potatoes with gravy, dragon punch drink for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-09-30.breakfast: Good morning! Enjoy a chicken sausage croissant, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with crispy tator tots, fruit, and milk choices.
2025-09-30.lunch: Let’s end September deliciously! Lunchtime is chicken and waffles. Other choices are yogurt parfait, or a baked potato—big for grades six through twelve, and half for kindergarten through fifth. On the side, broccoli and cheese, cheese cup for the potato, fresh fruit, and milk choices.
